article.Heading: What is the full form of GST? Good night, Sweet Dreams, Take care, say Twitterati
article.Summary: While the government celebrated the launch of GST at the Parliament’s central hall, citizens took to social media to share their views and welcome the new tax structure.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol News

The dream of one nation, one tax became a reality on July 1, and India bid farewell to its cumbersome tax regime as it embraced the Goods and Services Tax (GST).

While the government celebrated the launch of GST at the Parliament’s central hall, citizens took to social media to share their views and welcome the new tax structure.

#GST implemented

G - GoodNight

S - SweetDreams

T - TakeCare#GSTForNewIndia

At the stroke of the midnight hour, when the world sleeps, India will awake to 'one country, one tax' regime. Jai Hind!#GST#TrystWithGST

Happy Birthday #GST.
